title: SOLD: c1910 Portsmouth Cobblers Millbrook Stadium postcard, Ohio State League
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: c1910 Portsmouth Cobblers Millbrook Stadium postcard, Ohio State League
posts.post_content:
The postcard is depicting Millbrook Stadium used by the Portsmouth Cobblers of the Ohio State League.  The team was in action from 1909-1915, so it dates from that era.  Billy Southworth was first depicted on a postcard with the Cobblers.  I think its depiction of the industrial/small town feel of the era is great.  There is a color version of this postcard, but this B&W one is exceedingly rare.  SOLD net to me, postpaid in the U.S.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
I'll take it.  Please PM your PayPal info.  Thx!
